ygData.messageBody:
> From: "kosingigglephitz" <kosingigglephitz@...>
>
> --- In EverQuest@y..., "Orion" <orionv@c...> wrote:
> > I have a level 22 Mage and he does not carry a weapon at all. He
> carries a Stein and a book. Much more useful than any weapon I can
> find...:>
>
> So they can carry them in their slots that a weapon would go? I'm
> sorry for asking dumb questions, I'm really getting into my Mage so
> I'm working on getting him all buff! Yea a kick-a** Gnome Mage! ;-)

Yes. Generally, except for the first few levels, pure INT casters aren't
going to need or use weapons to fight with. They will use their pets (or,
in the case of Wizzies, use root and snare) to fight melee, while the
characters use spells. Since there are some decent INT items for use in
Primary and Sec slots, it pays to find them and use them instead of weapons.
